text_highlighted: completion  Generate the autocompletion script for the specified shell
config      Print the runtime configuration of a running trace-agent
-c, --config string        path to directory containing datadog.yaml (default "/opt/datadog-agent/etc/datadog.yaml")
-l, --cpu-profile string   enables CPU profiling and specifies profile path.
-m, --mem-profile string   enables memory profiling and specifies profile.
-p, --pidfile string       path for the PID file to be created
Use "trace-agent [command] --help" for more information about a command.
Error: unable to load Datadog config file: Config File Not Found: open /opt/datadog-agent/etc/datadog.yaml: no such file or directory
open /opt/datadog-agent/etc/datadog.yaml: no such file or directory

mitre_attack_techniques.signature_description: Executes commands using a shell command-line interpreter
Executes the "systemctl" command used for controlling the systemd system and service manager
Contains symbols related to standard C library sleeps (sometimes used to evade sandboxing)
Creates hidden files, links and/or directories
Uses the "uname" system call to query kernel version information (possible evasion)
Reads system information from the proc file system

signature_matches.description: Contains symbols related to standard C library sleeps (sometimes used to evade sandboxing)
Sample file is different than original file name gathered from version info
All HTTP servers contacted by the sample do not answer. The sample is likely an old dropper which does no longer work.
Sample and/or dropped files contain functionality for network address and service translation
Non-zero exit code suggests an error during the execution. Lookup the error code for hints.
Connects to IPs without corresponding DNS lookups
Reads system information from the proc file system
May try to detect the virtual machine to hinder analysis (VM artifact strings found in memory)
match_data: Handshakeimage/bmpimage/gifimage/pngvideo/avifont/woff[%v = %d]data_flow:protocolwebsocketnet/http.HTTP/1.1 HTTP/1.0 <a href="video/mp4succeededSee OtherUse ProxyForbiddenNot FoundToo EarlyTrailer: pr

Executes commands using a shell command-line interpreter
Executes the "systemctl" command used for controlling the systemd system and service manager
Tries to connect to HTTP servers, but all servers are down (expired dropper behavior)
URLs found in memory or binary data
